##Load data
```{r}
data = read.csv("EV_Reg_Indicators_By_State.csv")
head(data)
data = data[,which(!colnames(data) %in% c("State.Codes"))]
summary(data)
plot(data[, which(!colnames(data) %in% c("US.State"))])
colnames(data)

library(corrplot)
corrplot(cor(data[, c(1,3,4,5,6,7)]))
```
